feed.title: Findroid Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Findroid: v0.13.0 - Picture-in-picture
entry.content:
New features

  • Add picture-in-picture support #277 @cd16b
  • Play/pause media on double tap center area #450 @djchittoor

Improvements

  • Ripple effect when double tapping in player #401 @mustafadakhel
  • Improvements to hiding status and navigation bar when in player #302 @anilbeesetti
  • Show episode size when extra info is enabled #477 @Natanel-Shitrit

Fixes

  • Fix spelling error in remove address dialog #413 @Zunawe
  • Make add/delete server dialog translatable @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Add missing content descriptions to player controls #415 @cd16b
  • Fix some things with the locked controls #408 @cd16b
  • Fix playback position reset on process death and when device is locked @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Make external media (subtitles) follow app downloading preferences #433 @Natanel-Shitrit
  • Fix playback sync of downloads being too far ahead #465 @Jcuhfehl
  • Fix episode indicator wrapping on second line when 3 digits are displayed #468 @teobaranga

Translations

  • Chinese (Simplified) @6xingyv @lzyhenniu
  • Chinese (Traditional) @lzyhenniu
  • Dutch @JensDeLeersnyderPXL @zaourzag
  • French @boyer-nicolas
  • Hebrew @Natanel-Shitrit @ido19990
  • Hungarian @nagy4rmada11
  • Italian @cd16b
  • Korean @KimPig
  • Polish @teddy74eva @NeroPcStation
  • Portuguese (Brazil) @rogeriomendes
  • Romanian @AstroTheAstronaut
  • Russian @NickSkier
  • Slovak @Pysta
  • Spanish @crstian19 @Alehaaaa
  • Spanish (Latin America) @newton181 @Alehaaaa
  • Spanish (Mexico) @newton181 @Alehaaaa
  • Ukrainian @CakesTwix

Notes

  • Now targets SDK 34 (Android 14)
  • Min SDK in now 28 (Android 9)

entry.title: New release for Findroid: v0.13.1
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fix crash when clicking on next up in unloaded series @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Fix offline mode snackbar not showing in landscape mode #476 @Natanel-Shitrit
  • Fix enabling dark mode resets playback position @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Fix attaching/detaching keyboard cover resets playback position @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Fix incorrect background color in player popups when using dark mode @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Fix server stays visible when deleted and crash when clicking on it @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Fix crash when entering PiP and aspect ratio is 0 @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Fix stuck on login screen when server has no users #439 @Natanel-Shitrit

Translations

  • Chinese (Simplified) @TnZzZHlp
  • Chinese (Traditional) @lzyhenniu
  • Czech @miraficus
  • Hebrew @ido1990
  • Hungarian @nagy4rmada11
  • Italian #Daivy03
  • Korean @CodeName393
  • Portuguese (Brazil) @rogeriomendes
  • Slovak @Pysta
  • Slovenian @MrDog210

entry.title: New release for Findroid: v0.14.0 - Chapters & Mixed libraries
entry.content:
New features

  • Disable audio track in player @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Long press for 2x speed #596 @peerless2012
  • Option to start the player maximized #637 @Natanel-Shitrit
  • Chapters #466 @Natanel-Shitrit
  • Chapter markers are now displayed on the timebar
  • Long press on each side of the screen to skip to previous or next chapter
  • Support for mixed libraries #628 @nels0nwu

Improvements

  • Remove old downloads clean up #529 @Natanel-Shitrit
  • Remove hwdec-codecs and gpu-api options from mpv settings @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Use custom track selection dialog for exoplayer @jarnedemeulemeester
  • New default mpv options @jarnedemeulemeester
  • vo=gpu-next
  • hwdec=mediacodec
  • Make PiP remember zoom and brightness level #638 @cd16b
  • Improve PiP transistion when using home gesture #648 @Natanel-Shitrit @cd16b
  • Remove back button in locked controls @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Increase the limit of items displayed on the home screen @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Update mpvlib @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Update to mpv 0.37.0
  • Includes libplacebo (gpu-next)

Fixes

  • Delete userdata when deleting season or show @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Loading item restarts playback and causes duplicate external subtitle entries @jarnedemeulemeester

Translations

  • Bulgarian @alison2033
  • Chinese (Simplified) @liwenliang926
  • Chinese (Traditional) @lzyhenniu
  • Danish @Euromancer
  • French @PierreKy-org @haysberg
  • Hungarian @Zan1456 @adorjannm
  • Italian @cd16b
  • Korean @CodeName393 @KimPig
  • Portuguese @alison2033
  • Portuguese (Brazil) @rogeriomendes
  • Slovak @Pysta
  • Spanish (Latin America) @iFraan
  • Turkish @NukeSource
  • Vietnamese @MeguMario

Notes

  • Versioning has changed to CalVer (YYYY.MM.patch)
  • Lot's of progress has been made on the TV version but it is not ready to be released yet

entry.title: New release for Findroid: v0.14.1
entry.content:
Improvements

  • Request audio focus in mpv @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Sort items in collections by release date @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Improve landscape library layout on mobile @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Reduce community rating to one decimal place @jarnedemeulemeester

Fixes

  • Set correct surface colors when using dynamic colors or AMOLED theme @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Fix crash when setting picture-in-picture params @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Check address when adding extra addresses to server @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Display correct empty collection string @jarnedemeulemeester

Translations

  • Dutch @Iliannnn
  • Portuguese (Brazil) @alison2033

entry.title: New release for Findroid: v0.14.2
entry.content:
Improvements

  • Support HTML in media descriptions #713 @leekleak

Fixes

  • Library media items too small on tablet when in portrait mode #694 @peerless2012
